guide.description: We present to you a new innovative service! Tired of spending time generating profiles for your clients? ACO's Tool is the solution. You will be able to let your customer fill out a form with their information in their ticket. To then generate a .json file with these. The tool will ask you how many profiles it should create with the given information, and will jig the addresses, first and last name. The webhook will also be automatically created, integrated, and set up in the ticket in question.

field2.name: Intuitive
field2.value: The customer enters his own information! you just have to import in your bot

field3.name: Faster
field3.value: Generate as many accounts as needed in two clicks, no more copy pasting!

field4.name: J1g
field4.value: Generation of profiles with name, surname and address j1g

field5.name: Webhook management
field5.value: Automatic integration of the webhook in the ticket, with the effigy of the member!

field7.name: Scalable
field7.value: We are attentive and responsive, share your ideas with us!

field8.name: Pricing
field8.value: The subscription is 15 â‚¬ per month / server for 2 credits You can create a category and have a runner / credits This means that with 3 credits you can have 3 runners as well as 3 categories at most Each credit costs an additional 5 euros per month

guide.footer: For 15 euros / month / server for 2 credits

faq.description: Here are the answers to your questions, if you need help, do not hesitate to contact us!

0.name: How to subscribe?
0.answer: Go to the lounge <#963794793861886032> and click on the register button, a ticket will then be opened.

1.name: How to set up the tool?
1.answer: Once your license is activated, you just have to do the `?aco setup` command on your server.

2.name: How to generate profiles?
2.answer: You just need to click on the `Get profile` button once the form is completed, the tool will send you the generated profile.

3.name: My country is not the correct one, how can I change it?
3.answer: All you have to do is change your country in the form, respecting the format requested by your bot. (ex: FR / France, ...)

4.name: How to change the webhook?
4.answer: Just type the command `?aco ticket setwebhook` in the ticket, and send the link to the new webhook Only needed if you want to use a different webhook than the automatically generated one.

5.name: How to repost the message to create tickets?
5.answer: You just have to type the command `?aco ticket create` the tool will post the message.

setupGuide.field1: Add the bot to your server, click on the bot profile.
setupGuide.field2: Type the command `?aco setup` on your server. *It lets the bot know which server to look at*
setupGuide.field3: Press the ðŸ”„ button to update your profile.
setupGuide.field4: Add the runners, you have to click on the `Manage runners` button and give the runner's id. [How to find the id?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTgVsQ0gwKM)
setupGuide.field5: Create a category with the `?aco cat create` command.
setupGuide.field7: Other commands: `?aco ticket create` to post the message to create a ticket `?aco ticket setwebhook` to set another webhook `?aco ticket getwebhook` to retrieve the webhook
